TopicTitle: What the heck is the April Murder thingy

Articles.Content: I just visited KSP forums today after a long time to check out the channel log for .20, then I saw a bunch of people with survival notes about the spril murder thingy, what cruel april fools joke did I miss?
It was a horrible Forum Kraken attack that left hundreds...Thousands, slaughtered in it's wake. some survived...yet we salute the lost souls.

The whole forum and spaceport went down for about a week and a half. When it went back up the last forum backup was in October 2012 so anybody who registered after October lost their forum accounts and anyone from who registered before lost all their posts in that period.

Edit: or the Forum Kraken got us, whichever one works for you

Edited May 22, 2013 by Pursuedtank
Wow, that sucks, Good thing I haven't posted much between those periods. Technically I do have an extra a 1000 posts but moderation took that away from me a long time ago.
I lost the most popular and viewed thread in the fanworks forum, now I'm only #2 or 3

I lost the most popular and viewed thread in the fanworks forum, now I'm only #2 or 3

The horror!
Chobit for Kerbin President 2014. We must make it happen. FREE SRBS TO EVERYONE.

Chobit for Kerbin President 2014. We must make it happen. FREE SRBS TO EVERYONE.

yes very good idea.. .. ..

It be the revenge of the formerly slain Kraken, returned from the depths of the recycle bin to wreak havoc and destruction once more... We thought we won, but it seems like it is the one who had the last laugh...
